title: When does the academic session start at NIT? - Quora

response.answer_text: In general ,Academics Sessions of almost all NIT starts from around last week of july after summer vacation. most probably it start after 3rd round of seat allocation as well. Some of colleges which start from mid july some of them after 3rd week of july. so different colleges has different time table to start their academic session but ya all of are start from 2nd july upto last week of july.

In general, academic session in most of the NITs supposed to start from 2nd week - 4th week of July after the summer vacation and mostly on the first week of January after winter. PS. NIT JAMSHEDPUR's academic session is commencing from 23rd July 2018 for the session 2018–19.
